description:
Landing.Porto is an exclusive after-work event for the top 100 Tech Professionals in the Porto area.
This is Landing.jobs’ first ever event taking place in Porto! To celebrate this fact, our team has carefully chosen several companies that will showcase their culture, future projects, and technologies at the event.
As an attendee, you will have the opportunity to “sit in” on the jury to rate and provide feedback on the company’s pitches :) All of this taking place on a BOAT right on the Douro river!
This is the perfect opportunity to engage and better understand what these hand-selected companies are working on, what technologies they are investing in, and who participates in creating the magic behind their tech team.
Here are the companies joining us for this night to remember:
- Xing
- Natixis
- Mindera
- Hostelworld
More companies to be announced soon, stay tuned!
Where?
On a boat! Soon we are going to announce the meeting point :)
What's the agenda like?


19h00 - Boat Departs


19h30 - Showcases & Awards


21h00 / 21h30 - Snacks & Drinks


22h00 - Boat Returns *


* Our team will go & eat a hot meal (Francesinha maybe?) afterwards - you're welcome to join us!
All attendees are curated by the Landing.jobs team to make sure we onboard only the top 100 tech professionals from the Porto area. If you've paid for a ticket but your professional profile doesn't qualify, we'll fully refund your ticket.
name: Landing.Porto
